summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements (REQ-43 through REQ-46). The backend migration adds all seven exercises with correct details, sets, and reps. A diet plan template system with six meals and two options each is implemented. The frontend displays exercises in a searchable/filterable library and shows the diet plan template in the client dashboard. All requirements are fully implemented with proper muscle group filtering, exercise details, and diet plan presentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added difficulty levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced) for each exercise
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-43 specifies only name, muscle groups, sets/reps, and description. Difficulty levels were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added equipment needed field for exercises (e.g., 'Barbell or Dumbbells', 'Pull-up Bar or Lat Machine')
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-43 does not mention equipment information as a requirement. Only name, muscle groups, sets/reps, and description were specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added video URL support and video player iframe in exercise detail modal
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state 'Adding video URLs for the exercises' should not be done.

hallucinated_features.description: Added nutritional information fields (calories, protein, carbs, fats) for diet plan meals and food items
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state 'Calculating nutritional information (calories, macros) for diet plan meals' should not be done. REQ-44 only requires meal names and food descriptions.
